title: Ravage the Defeated (4R32)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Dunland
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Response: If your [Dunland] Man wins a skirmish, discard all Free Peoples cards borne by the companion or ally he was skirmishing.
Lore:	What the Dunlendings cannot steal, they destroy.
Rarity:	R
